text:
A habitual offender, who was involved in chain snatching, robbery and waylaying, was detained under the Goondas Act based on the recommendation of Superintendent of Police A. Saravanan here on Friday.

Collector T.N. Hariharan issued the order in this connection.

The detainee was S. Karunakaran (30) of Guberan Nagar in Sanarpatti Block.

He was arrested on the charges of snatching three sovereigns of gold jewels from an old woman at Kosavapatti bus stand on December 13.

He was shifted to Madurai Central Prison from Dindigul jail.
title: Detained under goondas act
